mapper.select: SELECT b.b_title AS boardTitle, l.location_x AS latitude, l.location_y AS longitude, l.location_detail AS detailAddress, b.b_period AS endDate, p.p_no AS partyNo, CONCAT(l.location_do, " ", l.location_si, " ", l.location_gu, " ", l.location_dong) AS address, p.p_amount_remain AS remainAmount, FORMAT(p.p_price / p.p_amount, 0) AS price, (6371 * acos( cos(radians(#{latitude})) * cos(radians(l.location_x)) * cos(radians(l.location_y) - radians(#{longitude})) + sin(radians(#{latitude})) * sin(radians(l.location_x)) )) AS distance FROM location AS l INNER JOIN board AS b ON l.b_no = b.b_no INNER JOIN party AS p ON p.b_no = b.b_no HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance;
